cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. You gain 2 life.
[-2]: Destroy each creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield.
[-5]: Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain lifelink until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.rules_text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Return target card from your graveyard to the battlefield face down.
Turn any number of face-up nonland permanents of your choice face down.

[+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Kai'Dwo, Eternal Ravager enters, create seven Idol tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice an Idol, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Whenever a spell or ability with one or more targets is put onto the stack, reselect its targets at random.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Acaji, the most experienced hunter in the Realm, was given a simple mission — hunt down the lion and return with its head. Not even he could have expected what he found upon arriving at the lion's den.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Look at the top sixteen cards of your library. Put any number of creature cards with different mana values from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The morning after Shigurei fell, the beasts of the Wild Realm snapped awake in unison. Today, they would roam free.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Vulpine Cloudchaser enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control perseveres, you may exile that creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. [i](A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)[/i]

Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, each opponent loses life equal to Morose Harpist's power.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She plays her dark melody on a lonely peak, with bodies of men driven mad by her song scattered about below.[/i]

Flying, first strike, haste

cards.flavor_text: [i]In the wake of the dragon's shadow, death soon follows.[/i]

[i]Ferocious[/i] — Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, that creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, create a token that's a copy of Resurging Rhino.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As Aito sliced the rhinoceros in twain, he was shocked to see its body grow back into two rhinos, now standing where one had stood just moments before.[/i]

Whenever a creature an opponent owns dies, exile the top two cards of that player's library face down. For as long as those cards remain exiled, you may look at them, you may cast them, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.
